name: Vandancer
description:
Movie Game Jam 2018 game where you're a though guy who dances with girls in a Thai bar.

Keys:

  • Arrow keys: play pressing them when over the white box
  • Numpad keys + and - to control window zoom while not in full screen
  • Numpad keys  / and * to control volume

 I'll update it after the gamejam to add more animations, a way better background image and fights with bad dudes every time you fail a certain amount of moves.

Follow its progress at https://twitter.com/Anarkade
